trans-unit.source: Represents a group of configuration elements that configure the providers for the `<configProtectedData>` configuration section.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Configuration.ProtectedProviderSettings"></xref> class.
Gets a <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationPropertyCollection"></xref> collection that represents the properties of the providers for the protected configuration data.
Use the <xref:System.Configuration.ProtectedProviderSettings.Providers%2A> property to access the properties of the providers for protected configuration data.
A <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationPropertyCollection"></xref> that represents the properties of the providers for the protected configuration data.
Gets a collection of <xref href="System.Configuration.ProviderSettings"></xref> objects that represent the properties of the providers for the protected configuration data.
Use this property to access the properties of the providers for protected configuration data instead of the <xref:System.Configuration.ProtectedProviderSettings.Properties%2A> property.
A collection of <xref href="System.Configuration.ProviderSettings"></xref> objects that represent the properties of the providers for the protected configuration data.
